text: @MiaFarrow That must be because New Yorkers are responsible, considerate people for the most part.  Here in SC, it’s a completely different story.  The VAST majority DO NOT wear masks.  They also refuse to acknowledge that SC is now the 3rd biggest Covid19 hotspot IN THE WORLD!  FFS!
